statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); short_cwd=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); git_branch=""; if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ] || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$git_branch" ] && git_branch=" ($git_branch)"; fi; cost=$(printf '%.2f' $(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // 0')); context_info=""; [ -n "$remaining" ] && context_info=" [${remaining}%, \$${cost}]"; printf "\033[38;2;232;127;95m‚ùã\033[0m \033[38;5;244m%s\033[0m\033[0;33m%s\033[0m\033[2;36m%s\033[0m" "$short_cwd" "$git_branch" "$context_info"
